{'symbol': 'AAPL'}.response: The 'Peer Ratio Averages' API provides an average of company peer ratios for trailing twelve months (TTM) data. For the provided symbol 'AAPL', the API calculates the average financial ratios by comparing Apple Inc. with its industry peers. These ratios encompass various financial metrics such as Price-to-Earnings (P/E), Price-to-Book (P/B), Debt-to-Equity (D/E), and Return on Equity (ROE) among others. The aim is to offer a benchmarking tool that helps in assessing AAPL's financial health relative to its competitors. The output comprises an aggregated view of how AAPL stands against its peers on these financial ratios, aiding investors in making informed decisions by understanding AAPL's valuation and financial stability in comparison to similar companies in its sector.
